Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 5 Upādinnattika » 5.3 Paccayavāra » 5.3.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 5.3.2.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Naāhārādi
Upādinnattika
Paccayavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Naāhārādi
42.
2582Upādinnupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā upādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati naāhārapaccayā…  naindriyapaccayā…  najhānapaccayā…  namaggapaccayā…  nasampayuttapaccayā…  navippayuttapaccayā…  nonatthipaccayā…  novigatapaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
